name: Brook Bravo
description:
Brook Bravo was a good sailor, not good enough for a thunderstorm, now he is lost in an unknown island and need to survive and fight against the king Kotran.

Press F1 to F5 change the screen color

Default controls:

Press ENTER to start :D

  1. Movement: WASD
  2. A: J
  3. B: K
  4. START : N
  5. SELECT: M

Made by:

  • Josimar Correa

  • Rafael Haharo
